attributes.title: Ruffles Potato Chips
attributes.description:
Created on November 19, 2010 by NateFord on Sourcemap.org:

Ingredients from a specific bag of regular Ruffles Potato Chips. Frito Lay buys potatoes from 80 farms across the United States and makes chips at 21 different factories, also all in the U.S. Thius bag was made in Vancouver, WA. Last year, Washington farmers alone produced over 112 million potatoes for Frito Lay.

Frito Lay buys potatoes from 80 farms across the United States and makes chips at 21 different factories, also all in the U.S. Thius bag was made in Vancouver, WA. attributes.name: Potatoes
attributes.title: Potatoes
attributes.description: Ruffles gets potatoes from 80 farms across the U.S. This particular bag's potatoes are from West Valley, Utah.

attributes.name: Final Product
attributes.title: Final Product
attributes.description: After the Potatoes are cut, the chips are made, and the bags are shipped off, they end up in grocery stores around the U.S. This bag ended up in Missoula.
